additional_notes: The script uses SLURM to manage resources and run the GEOS-Chem simulation.
It includes steps for setting up the environment, compiling GEOS-Chem (optional), and running the simulation.
The script also manages restart files and logs information to a file called 'gchp.log'.
The script uses environment variables set in a file named 'runConfig.sh' and a custom environment file specified by the 'gchp.env' symbolic link.
The script assumes the presence of 'GCHP.rc' and 'gcchem_internal_checkpoint' files, as well as a 'envSamples' subdirectory.
